errors.open_in_tg: Open this mini app inside Telegram
form.thanks_sent:
Thank you!
The sound has been sent for moderation
form.sound_name_hint: Enter a name for your sound. For example, "laughter", "ringtone".
form.category_hint: Choose a category for your sound from the list
faq.title: Copyright Disclaimer
faq.rule_1: You may upload only tracks that are not protected by copyright (public domain, royalty-free, Creative Commons), or tracks for which you have official permission from the copyright holder.
faq.rule_2: The bot administration is not responsible for any content uploaded by users. Full responsibility lies with the person who uploaded the file.
faq.rule_3: If you are a copyright holder and believe that your rights have been violated, please submit a content removal request in accordance with the U.S. Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA) via Telegram: @let_support
faq.footer: Your request will be reviewed and the infringing content will be removed.
